title: Approve Jer979’s request to serve as Mutant Marketing Advisor w/ Advisory Fee?
body:
Jer979’s Proposal to Serve as Strategic Marketing Advisor to Mutant Marketing (i.e. Mutant Marketing Advisor) was put up for review on the Community Forum and is now up for a community vote. 

Jer979 has applied for the position of Mutant Marketing Advisor. As Mutant Marketing Advisor, he will be responsible for collaborating with BraveNewDeFi to coordinate the efforts of the Mutant Marketing Hub and evaluate/develop marketing strategies. For more detailed information, you may review the forum post included at the bottom of this proposal.

As Mutant Marketing Advisor, Jer979 will use his experience and network to drive the mutual forward. In this role, he will work with BraveNewDeFi and the Mutant Marketing team to develop, implement, and execute a decentralized marketing strategy that can accelerate growth.

Given his role, responsibilities, and industry expertise/experience, Jer979 believes the following monthly advisory fee is in line with the Mutant Marketing Advisor position:
38.54167 NXM per month

Six-Month Total

231.25 NXM 

Forum Post: https://forum.nexusmutual.io/t/proposal-to-serve-as-mutant-marketing-advisor/602/1
author: 0xa50Ec178Bd0B184A890AB6d2e7a757a01Db3a702
